org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.health

Class RemoteHealthChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.health.RemoteHealthChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitor<Object>, HealthChecker<Object>

    public abstract class RemoteHealthChecker
extends Object
implements HealthChecker<Object>
    A RemoteHealthChecker performs a visit to an Activity by trying to contact a specific endpoint
    Author:
    alanrw

      • clearCachedEndpointStatus

        public static void clearCachedEndpointStatus()
        Clear the cached endpoint statuses. Normally RemoteHealthChecker will only check an endpoint again if it has been more than getEndpointExpiryInMilliseconds() milliseconds since last check, by default 30 seconds.

      • contactEndpoint

        public static VisitReport contactEndpoint(Activity<?> activity,
                                          String endpoint)
        Try to contact the specified endpoint as part of the health-checking of the Activity.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity that is being checked
        endpoint - The String corresponding to the URL of the endpoint
        Returns:

      • isTimeConsuming

        public boolean isTimeConsuming()
        A remote health-check is time consuming as it tries to contact an external resource.
        Specified by:
        isTimeConsuming in interface Visitor<Object>
        Returns:
